content.question: A researcher recorded the total number of minutes that 25 people spent looking at either a computer, phone, or television screen during a day and the number of minutes of sleep that they slept that night. The resulting data were used to conduct a hypothesis test to investigate whether there is a negative linear relationship between the total number of minutes spent looking at a screen and the number of minutes of sleep. What are the correct hypotheses for the test?

choices.label: <math alttext="H sub 0: b sub 1 equals 0. H sub a: b sub 1 is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><mtable><mtr><mtd><mtext></mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>0</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: beta sub 1 equals 0. H sub a: beta sub 1 is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><mtable><mtr><mtd><mtext></mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>0</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mtext>0</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

H sub a: beta sub 1 is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><mtable><mtr><mtd><mtext></mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>0</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext><mtext></mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 9.4: Setting Up a Test for the Slope of a Regression Model

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
